start_title: Welcome to the shop! Choose an option:
faq_content:
Q: How do I buy a product?
A: Click the "Buy" button and select a product from the list.

Q: How do I pay?
A: After selecting a product, you'll receive a payment link.

Q: When will I receive my purchase?
A: Immediately after successful payment.

Q: What if there's no stock?
A: Contact support for restocking information.
